verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lift up your heads, Pilgrims a-weary, See day’s approach Now crimson the sky; Night shadows flee, And your Belovèd, Awaited with longing, At last draweth nigh.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: He is coming again, He is coming again, The very same Jesus, Rejected of men; He is coming again, He is coming again, With pow'r and great glory, He is coming again!

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: O blessèd hope! O blissful promise! Filling our hearts w Wth rapture divine; O day of days! Hail Thy appearing! Thy transcendent glory Forever shall shine.

verse.name: v4
